title: Do You Know?
detail_text: <:th_ch0101/>Hey Maki-chan, the 14th of February and March are both days where you exchange sweets, so why isn’t it the same for April?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>...I’ve never thought about it, so I don’t know.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Oh, really!? Well, now’s a good opportunity then~ Let’s think about it together!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>You’re just gonna jump right into it!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>You see, I think Valentine’s Day and White Day are really fun events, so I think there should be more events like them. People who are good at making sweets could give out cookies and stuff! I bet Kotori-chan would make some for you, Maki-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Well... Kotori and Nico-chan do make sweets, yeah.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Don’t you think the sweets we get during those events feel extra special? It’s exciting, isn’t it~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>I can’t say you’re wrong.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>That’s why it’d be great if every 14th of the month could be a day to exchange sweets!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>I’m not so sure about that, though...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
